org.ow2.chameleon.core

Class ChameleonConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<String,String>
        • org.ow2.chameleon.core.ChameleonConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,String>

    public class ChameleonConfiguration
extends HashMap<String,String>
    Manages the configuration of the OSGi framework and of the chameleon container and services.
    Version:
    $Id: 1.0.4 $Id
    Author:
    The OW2 Chameleon Team
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • get

        public String get(String key,
                  String defaultValue)
        Retrieves the value from the configuration.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        defaultValue - the default value if the key is not present in the configuration
        Returns:
        the stored value or the default value if none

      • getDirectory

        public File getDirectory(String key,
                         boolean create)
        Retrieves a directory from the configuration. A file object build from the stored value and relative from the base directory is returned. If the 'create' flag is enabled, the directory is created.
        Parameters:
        key - the key associated to the directory name
        create - create the directory if it does not exist
        Returns:
        the file object

      • getBoolean

        public boolean getBoolean(String key,
                          boolean defaultValue)
        Retrieves the value from the configuration.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        defaultValue - the default value if the key is not present in the configuration
        Returns:
        the stored value or the default value if none

        Returns:

      • getFile

        public File getFile(String key,
                    boolean create)
        Retrieves a file from the configuration. A file object build from the stored value and relative from the base directory is returned. If the 'create' flag is enabled, the file is created.
        Parameters:
        key - the key associated to the file name
        create - create the file if it does not exist
        Returns:
        the file object

      • scanLibsDirectory

        public String scanLibsDirectory()
        Scans the jar file of the 'libs' directory to retrieve the packages to be exported.
        Returns:
        the packages contained in the jars located in the 'libs' directory
